com.tonbeller.jpivot.table
Interface TableComponentExtension

All Superinterfaces:
Available, com.tonbeller.wcf.bookmarks.Bookmarkable, PartBuilder
All Known Implementing Classes:
AxisStyleUI, DrillExpandMemberUI, DrillExpandPositionUI, DrillExpandUI, DrillReplaceUI, DrillThroughUI, ExcelTableExtension, MdxQueryUI, NonEmptyUI, ResetQueryUI, SortRankUI, SwapAxesUI, TableComponentExtensionSupport
public interface TableComponentExtension
extends PartBuilder

Extends a TableComponent. An extension is for example "drill down navigation" that may or may not be available.

Author:
av
